content: Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Jul 2019For Cromwell European REIT, would it better to get the CromwellReit EUR (SGX:CNNU) or CromwellReit SGD(SGX:CSFU)?On DBS Vickers the SGD version has a lower fees of over $10 but the EUR version has a higher fee of EUR 13 = SGD 211 answerAnswerBump0

Fan ZD, Employee at A BankLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 11 Jul 2019I went with the EUR version as it should have more liquidity, i.e. higher volumes to buy/sell.0 comments0
